dsOverview.title: Campbell's International Satellite Cloud Climate Project (ISCCP) B1, B2

summary.p: The satellite data is from GOES-9, GOES-10, GOES-12. There are line-drop problem prior to summer 1997. This may cause navigational error.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section, Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
